pages.text: 26|61|Eteke yetiya duyo dale parasparaka dekhile, tetiya muchara sangisakale ka’le, ‘niscaya ami dharaa parailo!’
26|62|Mucha'i ka’le, ‘ketiya'o nahaya, mora lagata mora pratipalaka ache; anatipalame te'om moka pathanirdesa karaiba’.
26|63|Tara pichata ami muchara prati ahi karailo ye, ‘tomara lakhutirae sagarata aghata karaa’. Phalata sagara bibhakta hai pratyeka bhaga bisala parbatara darae hai ga’la
26|64|arau ami ana dalatoko se'i tha'ira nikatararti karailo
26|65|arau ami ud'dhara karailo mucha arau te'omra sangisakala
26|66|tara pichata duba'i marailo anato dalaka.
26|67|Niscaya iyara majata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i mumina nahaya.
26|68|Arau niscaya tomara raba mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|69|Arau tumi sihamtara ocarata ibraahimara brttanta barnana karaa.
26|70|Yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau nija sampradayaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke kihara ibadata karaa’
26|71|sihamte ka’le, ‘ami murti puja karao; eteke ami nisthara saite se'itoke dharai thakima’.
26|72|Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke yetiya ahbana karaa tetiya se'iborae tomalokara ahbana suna payane
26|73|‘athaba sihamte tomalokara upakara na'iba ksati karaiba parae neki’
26|74|sihamte ka’le, ‘baram ami amara pitrpurausa sakalaka pa'icho, te'omloke enekuraa'i karaichila’.
26|75|Ibraahime ka’le, ‘tomaloke bhabi ca'ichane, yisakalara ibadata tomaloke karaa
26|76|‘tomaloka arau tomalokara pitrpurausa sakala
26|77|‘ataye mora satrau kerala bisbajagatara raba (allaha)ra bahirae.
26|78|‘Yijane moka srsti karaiche, tara pichata teraemi moka hidayata diche.
26|79|‘Teraemi moka ahara karaaya arau teraemi moka pana karaaya.
26|80|‘Arau yetiya ma'i asustha ha'om, tetiya teraemi moka araogya karae.
26|81|‘Teraemi mora mrtyu ghataba arau teraemi moka punarjiraita karaiba.
26|82|‘Arau te'omra ocarate'i mora asa ye, te'om moka kiyamatara dina mora aparaadhasamuha ksama karai diba.
26|83|‘He mora raba! Moka hikamata dana karaa arau satkarmasilasakalara antarbhukta karaa.
